post.text:
Thank you for your wonderful support last night- with regard to my Immigration Speech that I delivered at the Phoenix Convention Center. I love this country - and you, the people. Lets MAKE AMERICA SAFE AND GREAT AGAIN! I love you!
Donald J. Trump

comment.author: Bradley
comment.text: Donald Trump owes people money weather it's from trump college or businesses he has opened and never gave money to employees. Example is my cousin! Trump owes him money for a casino he opened. How sketchy, illegal, and only something that an inconsiderate person would do. If you know anyone that trump owes money to, stand up! Let it be known.

replies.author: Kyle
replies.text: Get in the real world! Hillary is the lying thief. Do your research !!

replies.author: Ashton
replies.text: He ows no one Money! Now Hillay Owe over 100 million dollars she stole for her disgusting foundation. Its funny watching Hilary supporters trying to find anything the can on Trump. But they cant. It always goes back to his university LOL They have nothing. WHY? Because does not have to lie and then hide like Killays does.

replies.author: Bradley
replies.text: Ashton I'm not a Hillary supporter either. I'm writing in the ballot if I can.
